info.CrewDescription:
One of the most effective crews versus armadas, especially versus bigger armadas. 
**Five of Eleven** will increase your mitigation making the armada do less damage on you. 
**Six of Eleven** increases your penetration, decreasing the effectiveness of the armadas mitigation, and increasing your overall damage versus the armada. 
**Khan** does what **Khan** does, so increases your damage by a lot.
info.StatPriority: What stats to stack below Deck

info.CrewDescription: For when you want to use your space Uber to summon ships
info.StatPriority: What stats to stack below Deck

info.CrewDescription: Primary Crew for higher tier Vi'Dars.
info.StatPriority:
Stats do not have a bigger impact.
 Focus on getting 300% on Attack, Defense and Health
